name: Ray Hayes
body: I was working as a web consultant in the early days when it was just getting going and these women approached me for a web site. I asked what it should be used for, and they looked at me a bit oddly. So, I expanded the question and asked what services they intended to deliver from the web site perhaps selling products or information. Again nothing. Finally, they said in frustration, "We registered the domain name. You figure it out!".
title: Just build it.
